class.name: project11_navigation/GotoTask
class.description: Project11 Navigation wrapper for a goto task.

class.name: project11_navigation/SurveyAreaTask
class.description: Project11 Navigation wrapper for survey area task.

class.name: project11_navigation/SurveyLineTask
class.description: Project11 Navigation wrapper for survey line task.

class.name: project11_navigation/TransitTask
class.description: Project11 Navigation wrapper for transit task.

class.name: project11_navigation/ExecuteTask
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin that given a task, determines the appropriate handler and executes it.

class.name: project11_navigation/NavCore
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin supporting ROS nav core pluggins.

class.name: project11_navigation/TaskConnector
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin that adds transit tasks between tasks.

class.name: project11_navigation/TaskManager
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin that determines the order to send tasks to an executive.

class.name: project11_navigation/TaskToTwistStack
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin that chains a series of handlers that process a task in series.

class.name: project11_navigation/NavCorePlanner
class.description: Project11 Navigation plugin that loads a NavCore global planner.
